The Stretch Philosophy.meta-description: Learn why flexibility is a second order effect of the practice of stretching (in yoga & in general)

Understanding Humans.title: Understand Humans, Sliders & Everything  | Doron Pagot
Understanding Humans.meta-description: Learn why continuous sliders are great, especially with humans.

The Essence Of Ashtanga Yoga.title: The Essence Of Ashtanga Yoga | Doron Pagot
The Essence Of Ashtanga Yoga.meta-description: If you practice, if you breathe, if you use your Mūla Bandha, that's the essence. If you have a 'quest', let it be one of those. Oh, and of course, have a teacher, someone to pass you down this important 1% of theory.

Random Is A (Useful) Fairy Tale.title: Random Is A (Useful) Fairy Tale | Doron Pagot
Random Is A (Useful) Fairy Tale.meta-description: Albert Einstein said (many times) that ‘god doesn’t play dice’. For some reason I never thought it through...
